documents.document: When militarised members of a society ignore the rule of law and follow the orders of a political tyrant it's a coup!! #NoBanNoWall
@feliciaday congratulations mumma. Welcome to the club of never peeing alone again and being so in love you think you might go mad with it.
@thomas_violence @ChristineMilne @billshortenmp Australia where we literally rob the poor of money they don't have #notmydebt
@thomas_violence @ChristineMilne @billshortenmp Australia where being disabled/queer/brown/female etc means you're second class
@thomas_violence @ChristineMilne @billshortenmp Australia where we torture pregnant refugees and leave them to suffer and die in gulags
@thomas_violence @ChristineMilne @billshortenmp Australia where we deport children with disabilities because We don't to spend money on them
American electoral college. Are you proud? It was your duty to prevent this! This is on you! #notmypresident #NoBanNoWall #humanrights
@shesjustanne had ppl stood for us the way you stand for immigrants and abled folks things would not have gotten so far
@shesjustanne it must be remembered. Because before they come for immigrants they come for us the dsp and we have been suffering in silence
Human rights are not selective they are for us all regardless of circumstance #NoBanNoWall #Disabledpeoplearestillhuman
It's important to remember all the countries condemning the #MuslimBan still deny entry to dsp ppl and deport ppl dx with dsp already there
@ProfBanks @dylanmarron yup we exist. Autistic person with two autistic little ppl. Unlike NT parents, I know why my kids do what they do!
@laurenduca @Mark_Sheppard @GovPenceIN sadly the same policies and same party just different mouth pieces.
@laurenduca @Mark_Sheppard it's what Malcom Turnbull did in Aus. Let tony spout off till ppl got mad then push for ldsp spill @GovPenceIN
@laurenduca @Mark_Sheppard @GovPenceIN pence is doing exactly what he's told. Let trump be crazy enough to be impeached and then roll on in.
@laurenduca @Mark_Sheppard @GovPenceIN not fooling anyone. Not surprising. https://t.co/mgCmUbtHkn
@clementine_ford @ClareMignon @HallSamm a neonate born before 22 weeks cannot survive outside the womb. Doctors call AND allow natural death
@clementine_ford @ClareMignon @HallSamm the line is usually medically 22 weeks gestation. Any later is only done for the mothers health
Stop telling women not to have abortions or use birth control and start telling men not to put their penises inside women.
But more than all that I'm tired of men thinking they have a say in the inside of my body.
If it's not your uterus then it's not your problem and you don't deserve a say. Restricting abortion does not end abortions it costs lives.
That's right it's not a baby it's a cluster of cells with the potential to be a baby in the right environment and circumstances.
80% of all pregnancies spontaneously abort(miscarry) during the first 12 weeks. Most abortions are performed during this time.
But aside from medical choice there is also the fact that until 12 weeks you are not even classed as viably pregnant in medical terms
Congenital disorders incompatible with life beyond birth. There are innumerable reasons for choosing abortion and the majority are medical.
Adenomyosis, endometriosis, hyperemeis garvidium, uterine infection, sepsis, pelvic instability, pelvic fusion, anencephaly, Tay Sachs
Molar pregnancy, blighted ovum, blocked tubes, ectopic pregnancy, uterine cancer, ovarian cancer, polycystic ovaries, cervical cancer
Abortion is not just a choice to terminate an unwanted pregnancy abortion is healthcare the following is a list of just the medical reasons
Seeing as trump has decided that abortions should be illegal and not covered I have decided I will now tweet every reason for abortion
@clementine_ford lol ppl like him couldn't organise a fart in a baked bean factory.
@clementine_ford she probably likes to poop alone in the morning too. And shower alone regularly also nice to sneeze without the squeeze
@DanneelHarris Jensen must be so chuffed. 'Look babe, finally got one that looks like me'.
@dominickevans @cherryrae yup tell that my subluxing sacro iliac joints and my ASD Eds type 3 kids. Fucking hate ableist parking police.
@ellavescent @cherryrae because I don't see gender norms as anything more than social conditioning that is irrelevant to me as a person
@ellavescent @cherryrae no one made me choose anything. If anything ppl have less influence on me because
@ellavescent @cherryrae arggg I'm Autistic and non binary because being autistic makes me see 0 point in limiting myself to 1 gender
@EverydayAbleism @cherryrae birth was easy compared to constantly dislocating my hips and pelvis and ribs while heavily pregnant
@EverydayAbleism @cherryrae 15 mins after precip birth and a dozen stitches I walked back to my room for the first time in days.
@EverydayAbleism @cherryrae i was in hosp for a wk prior to both babies births unable to walk with my pelvis pain.
@cherryrae they refuse to listen to actual autistic adults.
@cherryrae yup I hate having to deal with NT parents of ASD kids that insist that vax causes it. Then argue with me about autism.
Happy bday lovely lady, I hope your boys are spoiling you rotten and that your growing soccer star is going easy on your rib cage @realGpad
@MortuaryReport gahhhh fuck I hate SLxd ribs. Every breath hurts and you end up shallow panting and getting dizzy with low oxygen
@feliciaday congrats on the little human lovely lady
@MortuaryReport your strength and humanity makes me feel way less shit about the state of things. The world needs more of you.
@Pink congrats lovely. Such a gorgeous little person you grew.
@cherryrae know the feeling. Have also considered top surgery 4 the convenience alone. Haven't worn bras in years. Hate boob sweat.#Lopemoff
@NicholeOverall I'm gutted I seriously think the universe is so pissed with us a species that it's calling our best and brightest back home
@MissJeanLouis thank you. You're an incredible human, your spirit has changed the world in so many small ways for so many people. #love
@MortuaryReport your makeup game is always so boss. I wish I had half your skill I'm sitting here like damn I forgot underpants again lol
@cherryrae massive hugs lovely you are one hell of a tough human. Maybe they should change our mascot from zebras to tardigrades.
@CDA39 @PiccoliMp where is the funding to provide for kids like mine that will give you great test scores but need extra support and funds
@CDA39 @PiccoliMp my ASD kid is highly academically gifted. His test scores soaring. But socially he can't cope and spends half the year out
@CDA39 @PiccoliMp stop funding better education for already rich kids and start supporting those that need help.
@CDA39 @PiccoliMp public funds for public education only. Higher funds for lower performing schools and schools that cater to disability.
@CDA39 @PiccoliMp here's an idea, stop funding private and religious schools altogether. They make enough money off wealthy families.
I feel like a swollen piece of floppy cooked noodles. Scared to sit down incase I can't get back up without help. Fuck you summer #EDSbodies
Kids had a great time at carols in the park at QBN. Big thnx to QBN west rotary, Santa, and all who took part. @NicholeOverall @QbnPalerang
@TimOverall save us a good seat near the pond. Lol
@MortuaryReport thank you lovely you are too kind to us
@cherryrae also why I don't bedshare. Coz I move every hour or so to realign things that are out. I don't snuggle coz it hurts
@cherryrae also why mornings are horrific. No I'm not lazy I'm trying to do the subluxation count and put things back in carefully
@Taco_Lad @ABCthedrum @katemills18 see how non political we are willing to be when you gut edu funding and gonski so my ASD babies miss out
@Taco_Lad @ABCthedrum @katemills18 tell that to parents like me, who have to fight just to have their kids educated thanks to lib policy
@DanneelHarris congrats lovely on the creation of two new little hunters. #bosslevelmum
@JensenAckles congrats to you and daneel. She's an absolute boss growing two awesome little humans at once.
@CDA39 @perkinsmiki this is why DSP ppl suffer such high levels of abuse and violence. Because the gov tells us and others we are a burden
@RNLifeMatters @CDA39 we already know why! The ppl in charge just don't care to change it.
@RNLifeMatters @CDA39 long story short, the ppl at the top honestly don't care. One less young person is one less labour or green vote
@cherryrae happy day of the birth
@Netsnipe you do mean infection? Right? Because inflammation and bacterial infection do not the same thing.
@PWDAustralia this right here is why violence against DSP is so high. Because ableism is deeply entrenched + protected by government policy
@AmythestSchaber @DandelionGrrl what the actual fuck!! Not broken. In fact I'm pretty fucking happy with me, it's NT folks I can't stand
Huge congrats to @scrappyfudge and @Mark_Sheppard on your big day. Massive love from here in OZ.
@AutisticZebra @AmythestSchaber we become adults so listen to us when we tell you how your kids feel and think because we were your kids
@AutisticZebra @AmythestSchaber it's NT privilege. It's so detrimental to autistic kids because it is a form of parental ableism.
@facsnsw I'm stuck on hold with you guys I've been on hold in the queue for over 35 mins now and I still haven't spoken to a person
@cherryrae when someone screams don't ignore me, look at me, say something & I'm fighting tooth and nail to hold my exploding self together
@cherryrae if I'm staring off into the distance frozen in silent tears back the fuck away because that is my body shut down to reboot brain
@cherryrae my bane is being pushed into a meltdown by idiots that are ignorant.
@cherryrae then comes the vomit.
@cherryrae I can deal with the initial meltdown. It's the soul crushing guilt that follows immediately after. Not being able to prevent it.
@MortuaryReport you did amazing ace. You are one tough lady. Sending all my hugs and good pain drugs your way.
Lest we forget. Australia remembers those who made and make the ultimate sacrifice for our rights to be free from oppression. #LestWeForget
@cherryrae and the mast cell issues that make us basically allergic to anything on our skin. I can't even use sticky film anymore.
@MortuaryReport my heart goes with you. Pls be safe and take our voices with you. This is not okay and the world outside knows it. #weRwithU
America fucks the world by electing trump auspol cronies already kissing ass and ABC is showing WW2 doco. I feel sick. #whohasbunkerspace
@Samantha_Way sadly yes. We have a massive misogyny and violence against women problem here. These men now feels that more righteous
@Truman_Black @Samantha_Way not even American and I'm scared. There r groups of drunk men in pubs screaming "grab her by the pussy" @ the TV
@MortuaryReport pretty much free to air in Australia is showing the entire hunger games series this week in solidarity
Congrats to @jarpad and @realGpad on expanding the family of hunters.
@MortuaryReport he's fucking lucky u didn't stop wait for him to get out then run his arse over a couple times. Massive hugs hun
@cherryrae because in Aus it's illegal to use someone's image without their consent

@cherryrae @the_author_ for models to shoot. His work will not be published yet he still is required to have all models sign a model consent
@cherryrae @the_author_ proof this guy is a dickbag. My photographer friend is doing his major project for the semester and has asked for 1/

@LukeLPearson @ILC_UNSW @smh @michaelkoziol has to be fucking joking! Tony Abbott literally claimed Australia was empty before invasion.
@NicholeOverall considering we are Southern Hemisphere it's not even Samhain it's beltaine. Spring equinox. Our Samhain is in May.
@scrappyfudge what an inconsiderate cow. She's lucky your are lovely and didn't run her down with the stroller Mt druitt style.
